Will Smith tried his best not to coast on his charisma in KING RICHARD but his voice and the constant sour face were distracting. Jon Bernthal surprised me and Aunjanue Ellis stole her scenes. Even when she was just casually reacting I could see so many emotions in her eyes.

KING RICHARD is just nice. Manipulative, overlong, predictable and it looks like a TV movie from the 90s, but the story is really captivating. I wish at least Venus was better developed as a character, it's all about her insufferable dad. The Beyoncé song is incredible.
